column1: The Sea of Ringil was an inland sea south of the Sea of Helcar. It was created by the fall of the Lamp Ormal
column2: which was atop the tower known as Ringil (tower).

column1: During the tumult of the War for the Sake of the Elves
column2: it grew in size and "became a great sea flowing north-eastward and joining by straights both the Belegaer and East Sea" and divided Middle-earth into two landmasses
column3: the southern of which was called the Dark Land.
